StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MIGetTrainingOrgIDFromNWAId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAId int, @TrainingOrgID int OUTPUT AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @REG_ORG_ID int, @DIST_ORG_ID int, @RS_ORG_ID int, @RSS_ORG_ID int
SET @REG_ORG_ID = (SELECT ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID FROM NWA WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAId) SET @RS_ORG_ID = (SELECT PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP WHERE CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @REG_ORG_ID) SET @DIST_ORG_ID = (SELECT PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP WHERE CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @RS_ORG_ID) SET @REG_ORG_ID = (SELECT PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP WHERE CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = @DIST_ORG_ID)
IF @REG_ORG_ID = 901 -- Eastern Region SET @TrainingOrgID = 1 ELSE IF @REG_ORG_ID = 902 -- Western Region SET @TrainingOrgID = 2 ELSE RAISERROR('sp_MIGetTrainingOrgIDFromOrgID failed to determine training org', 16, 1)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
